item.description:
KouKou Traditional African Dance Workshop

Friends,

Fanta's Dance Days starts this coming Monday at 6PM for fun, exercise and learning some cool moves. I hope you can come. Please RSVP if you can.

But there is excitement brewing for THIS Saturday - Fanta is teaching an exciting 2 hour dance-shop in the Village Style of Guinea from Sangbarala, on the eastern provence of Guinea. KouKou is fun, not hard and Fanta will make it possible for everyone, advanced dancers to Beginners to dance the steps. With some life drumming provided by me and a few guests this is promising to be totally great. We'll have bottled water and fruit.

For more info KouKou Traditional African Dance Workshop

$30.- donation please. After, you will feel healed and transformed.

Please RSVPAbout this Meetup Group at
item.how_to_find_us: park on the street outside 50 Tufts Arlington and follow the DrumRoom signs. We are under the gym. You will walk into a room that is a slice of Africa! You will feel welcome.
item.name: Traditional Dance - Koukou with Fanta THIS Saturday!
